Helper-functions for scraping variable names and data set properties

scrapeHelpers.Rd

Helper-functions for scraping variable names and data set properties

sipExtractor(dat, stem, delim1, item_num, delim2, distinguish)

spiExtractor(dat, stem, delim1, item_num, delim2, distinguish)

spitExtractor(dat, stem, delim1, item_num, delim2, distinguish, delim3, wave)

siptExtractor(dat, stem, delim1, item_num, delim2, distinguish, delim3, wave)

Arguments

dat

input data frame of indicators of a particular LV
stem

input character stem of indicator variables for LV
delim1

optional input character of first delimiting character
item_num

optional input character to indicate range of variable numbers (defaults to scrape any digits)
delim2

optional input character of second delimiting character
distinguish

input character used as the identifier a particular partner
delim3

optional input character of second delimiting character
wave

input character for the particular wave of a longitudinal design

See also

Other helpers: esHelpers, outHelpers, outParamHelpers, scriptHelpers, semHelpers
